alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Cherokee; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 10 at 1:53PM CST until March 11 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...MINOR SNOW ACCUMULATIONS EXPECTED... .A winter storm will approach the Ozarks Region tonight causing widespread light snow to expand through the area. Some travel impacts are likely tonight through Friday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Light snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. There could be pockets of ice accumulations of around a glaze. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Kansas. Portions of central, east central, southwest, and west central Missouri. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 3 PM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Kansas, call 5 1 1 for road conditions. In Missouri, call 1-888-275-6636 for road conditions.
